00024 class ZoneList
00025 {
00026 public:
00027         Zone* zone;
00028         ZoneList* next;
00029         ZoneList(Zone* zone, ZoneList* next):
00030                 zone(zone),
00031                 next(next)
00032         {}
00033         ~ZoneList()
00034         {
00035                 delete zone;
00036                 if(next)
00037                         delete next;
00038         }
00039 };
